data.message:
WhatsApp doesn't have an official API, however some people have managed to reverse-engineer their stuff in the past, and WhatsApp kept changing things to make it harder for them.
I don't know what's the current status in the back-and-forth fight, but I don't think it's possible right now.
BTW this has nothing to do with .NET, there is no web api, so nothing can communicate with them.
